title: (x) Ecole Nationale de Théâtre du Canada logo - Badloc {Marc O}
content:
Hi Guy's,

I would like to know the name of this fonts.

Thank's

Marc C

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023204932/http:/typophile.com/files/Logo_1.jpg) | 10.62 KB |
author: Marc C

comments.content: i'm fairly sure that it's a free font called bedrock, stretched horizontally... i've got a copy in my 'substandard' folder :-)

Found the link... there sure are a LOT of fonts called bedrock!

[link edited by moderator]

Brett,

You were right, the fonts is bedrock and being stretched horizontally.

Thanks Very Much !!!!

Have a good one !

Bedrock is a rip-off of an Image Club font called Badloc.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/imageclub/badloc/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023204932/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/imageclub/badloc/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/imageclub/badloc/")
Please review that link. I'm not so sure it should be posted.
